theUnchainedMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theUnchainedMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theUnchainedMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theUnchainedMod:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.

theUnchainedMod:BootKnife.NAME: Boot Knife
theUnchainedMod:BootKnife.FLAVOR: It's handy. If you don't step into it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a hidden blade to your hand.

theUnchainedMod:OiledChains.NAME: Oiled Chains
theUnchainedMod:OiledChains.FLAVOR: Don't touch. Your hands won't be clean for a century.
DESCRIPTIONS: The seventh card you play each combat costs zero.
